    • Method Detail

      • getEveryPokemon

        java.util.ArrayList<Pokemon> getEveryPokemon()

        Searches all the Pokemon inside the DB

        Returns:
        an Arraylist containing all the Pokemon that satisfy search conditions

      • update

        boolean update(java.lang.Object target,
               java.lang.Object newValue)

        Updates one or more fields of one or more Pokemon

        Parameters:
        target - query to target Pokemon to update
        newValue - query to express new value of the field(s)
        Returns:
        true if the update is correctly submitted

      • updatePokemon

        long updatePokemon(Pokemon old_p,
                   Pokemon new_p)

        Updates old_p fields according to new_p

        Parameters:
        old_p - Pokemon to modify
        new_p - Pokemon with updated fields
        Returns:
        number of modified Pokemon
